In England, in the seven days to 10 April, there were 15,769 new confirmed cases (28.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 April, there were 20,231 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 22% (4,462 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 15 April is 3,828,666 (6,802 cases per 100,000 population).
